trans-unit.target: Fix Stylus lag (breaks touchscreen double-tap to open)

trans-unit.source: Default OFF. If ON there will be no lag with graphic tablets, Wacom or Microsoft Surface stylus, but it will also disable double-tap (touchscreen) to open files (you would then need to use Single Click to Open folders option, and to open files by long-tap and Open from context menu). This is due to a bug in Microsoft WPF. Program restart required
trans-unit.target: Default OFF. If ON there will be no lag with graphic tablets, Wacom or Microsoft Surface stylus, but it will also disable double-tap (touchscreen) to open files (you would then need to use Single Click to Open folders option, and to open files by long-tap and Open from context menu). This is due to a bug in Microsoft WPF. Program restart required

Confirmation after clicking to register as default file manager in settings

trans-unit.source: Important: This is an [BOLDSTART]experimental feature[BOLDEND] that will edit your Registry to make OneCommander the default file manager and folder handler (Open/Save dialogs cannot be replaced). [NEWLINE][BOLDSTART]This will make Windows File Explorer unusable[BOLDEND] - even when clicking a folder in File Explorer the OneCommander will open. [NEWLINE]You will need to [BOLDSTART]unregister it[BOLDEND] by unchecking this option if you ever move or remove OneCommander (uninstalling it will not reverse changes)![NEWLINE]This will also enable running in the background for faster window opening.[NEWLINE]Are you absolutely sure you want to proceed and you know how to restore the registry on your own if something fails (no support in case of recovery)?
trans-unit.target: Important: This is an [BOLDSTART]experimental feature[BOLDEND] that will edit your Registry to make OneCommander the default file manager and folder handler (Open/Save dialogs cannot be replaced). [NEWLINE][BOLDSTART]This will make Windows File Explorer unusable[BOLDEND] - even when clicking a folder in File Explorer the OneCommander will open. [NEWLINE]You will need to [BOLDSTART]unregister it[BOLDEND] by unchecking this option if you ever move or remove OneCommander (uninstalling it will not reverse changes)![NEWLINE]This will also enable running in the background for faster window opening.[NEWLINE]Are you absolutely sure you want to proceed and you know how to restore the registry on your own if something fails (no support in case of recovery)?
trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.

trans-unit.target: Do you want to [BOLDSTART]restart program now[BOLDEND] to apply all changes?[NEWLINE]This will cancel all ongoing operations initiated by OneCommander

When closing settings window after changing settings requiring restart

trans-unit.source: Important: This is an [BOLDSTART]experimental feature[BOLDEND] that will edit Windows Registry to completely replace Windows File Explorer Win+E hotkey. This registry change will make OneCommander open when clicking Explorer shortcut, but won't disable navigation within Explorer. The only way to reverse this is by unchecking this button from OneCommander or running the registry script from OneCommander folder (uninstalling OC won't change it automatically). [NEWLINE]Proceed?
trans-unit.target: Important: This is an [BOLDSTART]experimental feature[BOLDEND] that will edit Windows Registry to completely replace Windows File Explorer Win+E hotkey. This registry change will make OneCommander open when clicking Explorer shortcut, but won't disable navigation within Explorer. The only way to reverse this is by unchecking this button from OneCommander or running the registry script from OneCommander folder (uninstalling OC won't change it automatically). [NEWLINE]Proceed?

trans-unit.source: The OneCommander Connector is an experimental standalone utility to help connect OC with system Open and Save dialogs of other programs. A small window will appear under a compatible open/save dialog to let you set its folder to the path opened in OneCommander. It runs independently from OC.
trans-unit.target: The OneCommander Connector is an experimental standalone utility to help connect OC with system Open and Save dialogs of other programs. A small window will appear under a compatible open/save dialog to let you set its folder to the path opened in OneCommander. It runs independently from OC.

trans-unit.source: Connector started. To test, close this settings window, open Notepad and then click File->Open to see it in action
trans-unit.target: Connector started. To test, close this settings window, open Notepad and then click File->Open to see it in action

trans-unit.source: This will download OneCommanderConnector.exe from OneCommander.com website. Since this utility starts with an invisible window and monitors when an Open or Save dialog window opens, an antivirus software may complain that it is suspicious. It is safe but if you have concerns please contact support.
trans-unit.target: This will download OneCommanderConnector.exe from OneCommander.com website. Since this utility starts with an invisible window and monitors when an Open or Save dialog window opens, an antivirus software may complain that it is suspicious. It is safe but if you have concerns please contact support.

trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.

trans-unit.source: Creates database file in Settings folder instead of using Windows thumbnail cache for storing file preview images. File will be large. Overrides default folder thumbnails and disables using custom folder icons
trans-unit.target: Creates database file in Settings folder instead of using Windows thumbnail cache for storing file preview images. File will be large. Overrides default folder thumbnails and disables using custom folder icons

trans-unit.source: Left and Right arrow control for media playback
trans-unit.target: Left and Right arrow control for media playback

trans-unit.source: Allows previewing all media in same number of jumps, regardless of length. Default 12% (8 jumps)
trans-unit.target: Allows previewing all media in same number of jumps, regardless of length. Default 12% (8 jumps)

trans-unit.source: This will make showing thumbnails slower until each thumbnail is extracted again the first time each folder is opened.[NEWLINE]Are you sure?
trans-unit.target: This will make showing thumbnails slower until each thumbnail is extracted again the first time each folder is opened.[NEWLINE]Are you sure?

trans-unit.source: The Pro license is required for commercial use
trans-unit.target: The Pro license is required for commercial use

trans-unit.source: Before contacting support, please read the user manual
trans-unit.target: Before contacting support, please read the user manual

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to deactivate license? You will need to enter Pro License key to activate it again
trans-unit.target: Are you sure you want to deactivate license? You will need to enter Pro License key to activate it again

trans-unit.source: See Shortcuts Editor in Settings 🡢 Advanced
trans-unit.target: See Shortcuts Editor in Settings 🡢 Advanced

trans-unit.source: Click to copy Hardware ID to clipboard and open OneCommander.com
trans-unit.target: Click to copy Hardware ID to clipboard and open OneCommander.com

trans-unit.source: 1. Using the above button open the purchase page and paste the Hardware ID (it should already be on clipboard) and enter your email 2. After completing the purchase, you should receive an automatic email with activation code (check spam also) 3. Paste the license from the email into the field below
trans-unit.target: 1. Using the above button open the purchase page and paste the Hardware ID (it should already be on clipboard) and enter your email 2. After completing the purchase, you should receive an automatic email with activation code (check spam also) 3. Paste the license from the email into the field below

trans-unit.source: 4. Restart program to activate all features
trans-unit.target: 4. Restart program to activate all features

trans-unit.source: Thank you for the purchase and supporting program development. Please restart the program to enable all features
trans-unit.target: Thank you for the purchase and supporting program development. Please restart the program to enable all features

trans-unit.source: Couldn't open website. Open manually in web browser
trans-unit.target: Couldn't open website. Open manually in web browser

trans-unit.source: Volume licenses (10+) available if purchased for domain:
trans-unit.target: Volume licenses (10+) available if purchased for domain:

trans-unit.source:
OneCommander is free for HOME use with a limited features set.
For commercial use, the PRO license is required, regardless if the user needs these additional features (labeled with PRO in Settings).
trans-unit.target:
OneCommander is free for HOME use with a limited features set.
For commercial use, the PRO license is required, regardless if the user needs these additional features (labeled with PRO in Settings).

trans-unit.source: The license is valid for this computer only
trans-unit.target: The license is valid for this computer only

trans-unit.source:
Before making a purchase, please make sure you are signed into Microsoft Store with an account that you'd like to associate with this purchase, so you can reinstall it in the future and on additional computers with the same account.
The license will be valid for up to 10 computers used with the same Microsoft Account (as defined in Microsoft Store policy)
trans-unit.target:
Before making a purchase, please make sure you are signed into Microsoft Store with an account that you'd like to associate with this purchase, so you can reinstall it in the future and on additional computers with the same account.
The license will be valid for up to 10 computers used with the same Microsoft Account (as defined in Microsoft Store policy)

trans-unit.source: Couldn't find a valid license with the current Microsoft account. Please check your email for the original purchase receipt and then click the button below to log into the same account that was used to purchase the license.
trans-unit.target: Couldn't find a valid license with the current Microsoft account. Please check your email for the original purchase receipt and then click the button below to log into the same account that was used to purchase the license.

trans-unit.source: Please wait for the Microsoft Store...
trans-unit.target: Please wait for the Microsoft Store...

trans-unit.source: Existing purchase verified. Please restart program to unlock all features.
trans-unit.target: Existing purchase verified. Please restart program to unlock all features.

trans-unit.source: The purchase did not complete. You can complete the purchase anytime Microsoft Store is available.
trans-unit.target: The purchase did not complete. You can complete the purchase anytime Microsoft Store is available.

trans-unit.source: Pro license is required to use in a commercial setting.[NEWLINE]Please test it for a couple of days but if you find the program useful please purchase the license from the Microsoft Store (through About dialog)
trans-unit.target: Pro license is required to use in a commercial setting.[NEWLINE]Please test it for a couple of days but if you find the program useful please purchase the license from the Microsoft Store (through About dialog)

trans-unit.source: Windows refused to open default web browser to https://onecommander.com/license.html. Please open web browser manually and paste the Machine ID (it is already copied on the clipboard and ready to paste)
trans-unit.target: Windows refused to open default web browser to https://onecommander.com/license.html. Please open web browser manually and paste the Machine ID (it is already copied on the clipboard and ready to paste)

trans-unit.source: The entered license key doesn't match this Machine ID. If you have purchased Pro license for another machine and would like to move it to this one, reply to the original purchase confirmation email and include the Machine ID from above.
trans-unit.target: The entered license key doesn't match this Machine ID. If you have purchased Pro license for another machine and would like to move it to this one, reply to the original purchase confirmation email and include the Machine ID from above.
